name: Source Insight Project
summary: Learn about .PR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: PR files are created by version 3 of Source Insight to store projects. When you save a project as a PR file in Source Insight 3 the PR file is stored in the following directory:

The PR file format was replaced by the SIPROJ file format in version 4 of Source Insight. However, you can still open PR projects in version 4 of Source Insight by selecting Project → Open Project.... The project is saved in the new SIPROJ format while the original PR file remains unedited.

description: A PR file is a project created by Source Insight 3, a source code editor. It contains session state information for the project workspace and links to source files associated with the project.
